name: Super Gun Scavenger
description:
Collect randomly generated guns to defend yourself and your pet piglet from hordes of zombies. Oh, and you can use explosive fish as bullets.

  Collect gears to roll a new weapon type. Gears are also score. 
 
  Over time there will be more zombies spawned, and they will get stronger, try to get the highest score you can before your inevitable death!

  This game was made in a week for the ' Take Arms! ' Jam 2017.

    Follow me on twitter : @GeorgeB_Green

   Music by Anttis : http://anttismusic.blogspot.ro/
